Title: Requires certain playgrounds to be universally accessible
Summary: Requires playgrounds in New York city parks, state parks, and municipalities to be universally accessible.
LawCode: Add ยง79-r, Civ Rts L; add ยง248, Gen Muni L; add ยง18-166, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, the general municipal law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring universally accessible playgrounds in New York city and state parks
